title: Xerath mains would be great actors.
body:
They follow the script so well.



*~~somebody kill me~~*

replies.body: There are games where every Ult hits, and there are games where not a single ult hits. You get called a scripter in both...
Because you downloaded the wrong one if they miss.

I've been accused of scripting so many times when I play Xerath...

Not saying I'm fantastic or anything, I've just had some good games.
To be fair, there's an all scripting xerath club out there
